results.title: Severe metabolic acidosis due to massive metformin overdose in a man: a case report
results.text_hl: Following a suicide attempt with an @DISEASE_Drug_Overdose @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@ of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, he experienced symptoms such as @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@ and @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Manouchehri A, Rashidian H, Zakariaei Z. Severe metabolic acidosis due to massive metformin overdose in a man: a case report Oxf Med Case Reports. 2023 May;2023(5):omad049. PMID: 37260725
citations.BibTeX: @article{37260725, title={Severe metabolic acidosis due to massive metformin overdose in a man: a case report}, author={Manouchehri A and Rashidian H and Zakariaei Z}, journal={Oxf Med Case Reports}, volume={2023}, number={5}, pages={omad049}}

results.title: A case of anti-HMGCR myopathy triggered by sodium/glucose co-transporter 2 (SGLT2) inhibitors.
results.text_hl: We report the case of a 76-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who developed @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@, @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, and increased CK, following treatment with @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@, a sodium/glucose co-transporter 2 (SGLT2) inhibitor, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Stella M, Biassoni E, Fiorillo C, Grandis M, Mattioli F, Del Sette M. A case of anti-HMGCR myopathy triggered by sodium/glucose co-transporter 2 (SGLT2) inhibitors. Neurol Sci. 2022 Jul;43(7):4567-4570. PMID: 35391603
citations.BibTeX: @article{35391603, title={A case of anti-HMGCR myopathy triggered by sodium/glucose co-transporter 2 (SGLT2) inhibitors.}, author={Stella M and Biassoni E and Fiorillo C and Grandis M and Mattioli F and Del Sette M}, journal={Neurol Sci}, volume={43}, number={7}, pages={4567-4570}}

results.title: Exacerbation of myopathy triggered by antiobesity drugs in a patient with multiple acyl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency
results.text_hl: A 28-year-old Taiwanese @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ presented with dyspnoea, @DISEASE_Feeding_and_Eating_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001068 @@@poor appetite@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@ after using antiobesity drugs, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Triiodothyronine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014284 @@@triiodothyronine@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Topiramate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077236 @@@topiramate@@@.

citations.NLM: Lin PY, Liang WC, Liao WA, Sun YT. Exacerbation of myopathy triggered by antiobesity drugs in a patient with multiple acyl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency BMC Neurol. 2021 Feb 27;21(1):93. PMID: 33639866
citations.BibTeX: @article{33639866, title={Exacerbation of myopathy triggered by antiobesity drugs in a patient with multiple acyl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency}, author={Lin PY and Liang WC and Liao WA and Sun YT}, journal={BMC Neurol}, volume={21}, number={1}, pages={93}}

results.title: COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report.
results.text_hl: Case Presentation: On 12 July 2022, a 58-year-old black female retiree with significant symptoms of @DISEASE_Hypesthesia @DISEASE_MESH:D006987 @@@numbness@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@muscle weakness@@@ in the hands and legs was brought into the emergency room.

citations.NLM: Bereda G. COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report. Ann Med Surg (Lond). 2024 Dec;86(12):7318-7321. PMID: 39649935
citations.BibTeX: @article{39649935, title={COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report.}, author={Bereda G}, journal={Ann Med Surg (Lond)}, volume={86}, number={12}, pages={7318-7321}}

results.title: Severe lactic acidosis and hypoglycemia due to acute metformin intoxication in a dog.
results.journal: J Vet Emerg Crit Care (San Antonio)
results.text_hl: CASE SUMMARY: A female neutered @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rat@@@ Terrier was presented for an acute onset of @DISEASE_Seizures @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@-like episodes, @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@, and @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@ approximately 14 hours after ingestion of 198 mg/kg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Ueda Y, Wong C, Borchers A. Severe lactic acidosis and hypoglycemia due to acute metformin intoxication in a dog. J Vet Emerg Crit Care (San Antonio). 2018 May;28(3):274-278. PMID: 29687945
citations.BibTeX: @article{29687945, title={Severe lactic acidosis and hypoglycemia due to acute metformin intoxication in a dog.}, author={Ueda Y and Wong C and Borchers A}, journal={J Vet Emerg Crit Care (San Antonio)}, volume={28}, number={3}, pages={274-278}}
